bib.title: Multi-objective parameter-less population pyramid in solving the real-world and theoretical problems
bib.author: Przewozniczek, Michal W and Dziurzanski, Piotr and Zhao, Shuai and Indrusiak, Leandro S
bib.abstract: Many real-world problems are notoriously multi-objective and NP-hard. Hence, there is a constant striving for optimizers capable of solving such problems effectively. In this paper, we examine the Multi-Objective Parameter-less Population Pyramid (MO-P3). MO-P3 is based on the Parameter-less Population Pyramid (P3) that was dedicated to solving single-objective problems. P3 employs linkage learning to decompose the problem and uses this information during its run. P3 maintains many different linkage information sets, which is the
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference Companion
